Translations.Text: allaah ke siva koee poojy nahin, vah jeevit, nity sthaayee hai
useene aapapar saty ke saath pustak (quraan) utaaree hai, jo isase pahale kee pustakon ke lie pramaanakaaree hai aur useene tauraat tatha injeel utaaree hai

isase poorv, logon ke maargadarshan ke lie aur furqaan utaara hai[1] tatha jinhonne allaah kee aayaton ko asveekaar kiya, unheen ke lie kadee yaatana hai aur allaah prabhutvashaalee, badala lene vaala hai
nihsandeh allaah se aakaashon tatha dharatee kee koee cheez chhupee nahin hai
vahee tumhaara roop aakaar garbhaashayon mein jaise chaahata hai, banaata hai. koee poojy nahin, parantu vahee prabhutvashaalee, tatvagy

useene aapapar[1] ye pustak (quraan) utaaree hai, jisamen kuchh aayaten muhî€¼kam[2] (sudrdh) hain, jo pustak ka mool aadhaar hain tatha kuchh doosaree mutashaabih[3] (sandigdh) hain. to jinake dilon mein kutilata hai, ve upadrav kee khoj tatha manamaana arth karane ke lie, sandigdh ke peechhe pad jaate hain. jabaki unaka vaastavik arth, allaah ke siva koee nahin jaanata tatha jo gyaan mein pakke hain, ve kahate hain ki sab, hamaare paalanahaar ke paas se hai aur budhdimaan log hee shiksha grahan karate hain
(tatha kahate haih) he hamaare paalanahaar! hamaare dilon ko, hamen maargadarshan dene ke pashchaat kutil na kar, vaastav mein, too bahut bada daata hai
he maare paalanahaar! too us din sabako ekatr karane vaala hai, jisamen koee sandeh nahin. nihsandeh allaah apane nirdhaarit samay ka virudhd nahin karata
